import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Divider } from 'antd'; import NumberFormat from 'react-number-format'; import './BillToPrint.style.scss'; import moment from 'moment'; export default class BillToPrint extends Component { render() { const { checkoutSession } = this.props; return (

    SL
